comment: Definitely get the maple syrup on the nose. The flavor is sweet, but not overly. You get a little maple syrup on the front of the taste and a little bit of spice on the backend. Also a bit of vanilla in the aftertaste. Not an everyday sipper, but a nice change of pace whiskey.
Aged on Stout barrels. Surprisingly smooth

• Nose: having trouble getting much in the highball glass
• Taste: sweet, maple, slight oak vanilla, very smooth, almost a wheated level of sweet and smooth, brown sugar
Smooth with little to no bite. Hints of vanilla, maple, leather. Good finish.
